item.title: 扎克伯格向特朗普靠拢引发终局问题
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，莱莉-格里芬（Riley Griffin）撰文介绍了她和同事库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）在对马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）的政治右倾化进行深入研究后发现的问题。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin writes about what she and colleague Kurt Wagner found in an in-depth examination of Mark Zuckerberg’s turn to the political right.】

item.title: 白宫首席经济学家为何如此看重欧元危机
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们来看看白宫首席经济学家对美国金融脆弱性的一些看法。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at some thoughts on US financial vulnerability sketched by the White House chief economist. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 调查显示欧洲企业对中国业务失去信心
item.description: 一项最新调查显示，在华经营的欧洲企业对增长前景的悲观程度为2011年以来最高。【原文：European companies operating in China are the most pessimistic about growth prospects since 2011, a new survey shows.】

item.title: 欧盟证券化改革将使部分资本缓冲减半
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的文件显示，欧盟正在提议制定规则，鼓励银行卸载抵押贷款，并将贷款人必须持有的现金减半，以抵消他们在自己账簿上保留的一些重新打包的债务。【原文：The European Union is proposing rules that encourage banks to offload mortgages and halve the cash that lenders must hold against some repackaged debt they keep on their own books, according to documents seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 美国国债在拍卖前震荡，需求成为焦点
item.description: 美国国债下跌，结束了连续三个交易日的涨势，因为在最近的拍卖显示对政府债券的需求减弱之后，人们的注意力转向了新一波的供应。【原文：US Treasuries slipped, snapping three days of gains, as attention turns to a fresh wave of supply after recent auctions signaled weaker demand for government paper.】

item.title: 巴西航空公司 Azul 在美国申请破产保护
item.description: Azul SA 申请破产，这是巴西最新一家寻求债权人保护的大型航空公司，一年多来，该公司一直在努力应对更高的开支和大流行病对航空业的持续影响。【原文：Azul SA filed for bankruptcy, the latest major Brazilian airline to seek protection from creditors after struggling for more than a year of to cope with higher expenses and the lingering impact from the pandemic on the aviation sector.】

item.title: 日产向英国贷款可能促使日本采取行动
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.）为获得英国政府支持的贷款所做的努力引发了一个问题：日本是否也会迫于压力介入并支持这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s efforts to obtain a loan backed by the UK government raises the question of whether Japan will be pressured to step in and also support the struggling Japanese automaker.】

item.title: Dollar May Face ‘Major’ Drop in 2026, Standard Chartered Says
item.description: The risk of a “major” downturn in the dollar will increase next year if President Donald Trump’s policies add to the US debt burden but fail to boost the economy, according to Standard Chartered.

item.title: Centrica Expands to New York With Build-Out of Gas Trading Unit
item.description: Centrica Plc is opening a trading office in New York that will underpin its growth in natural gas.

item.title: 法国兴业银行主席称欧盟应重新考虑银行交易规则
item.description: 欧盟最大的证券公司之一的董事长表示，鉴于欧盟希望扩大其资本市场，欧盟应考虑是否仍有必要对银行的交易业务制定严厉的新规则。【原文：The European Union should consider whether tough new rules for banks’ trading operations are still warranted given the region wants to expand its capital markets, according to the chairman of one of the bloc’s largest securities firms.】

item.title: 关税截止日期前华尔街关注中国股市避险情绪
item.description: 自 4 月份跌至四个月低点以来，随着中美贸易紧张局势的缓解，中国股市已反弹近 25%。22V Research认为，这使得中国股市在未来几周和几个月内很容易再次出现大跌。【原文：Since slumping to a four-month low in April, Chinese equities have rallied nearly 25% as US-China trade tensions eased. According to 22V Research, that’s left the stocks vulnerable to yet another selloff in coming weeks and months.】

item.title: Kantar 称，零售商与黑客作战，M&S 杂货销售额上升
item.description: 玛莎百货集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc）在过去三个月中的杂货销售额有所增长，尽管这家英国零售商正在应对导致其部分系统瘫痪的重大网络攻击。【原文：Marks & Spencer Group Plc’s grocery sales rose in the last three months even as the British retailer tackled a major cyberattack that crippled some of its systems.】

item.title: 英伟达将对大型科技公司强劲财报季发表最终意见
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）面临着财报季推动涨势的最后考验，这轮涨势使其股价从 4 月份的低点上涨了 40% 以上。【原文：Nvidia Corp. faces the final test of an earnings season-driven rally that has sent its shares up more than 40% from an April low.】

item.title: 油价下跌后，沙特股票将成为五月全球最差股票
item.description: 由于油价下跌引发了对沙特大型项目支出放缓的担忧，本月沙特股市下滑将成为全球表现最差的股市。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sliding stocks are on course to be the worst performers globally this month as falling oil prices prompt concerns of slower spending on mega projects in the kingdom.】

item.title: 中国中信集团与 MAG 集团将在迪拜合作开发价值 60 亿美元的项目
item.description: 中国国有企业集团中信有限公司（Citic Ltd.）签署了一份谅解备忘录，将为迪拜一个计划投资 220 亿迪拉姆（约合 60 亿美元）的开发项目提供资金，该项目将为迪拜蓬勃发展的市场增加数千套住房。【原文：Chinese state-owned conglomerate Citic Ltd. signed a memorandum of understanding to help finance the development of a planned 22 billion dirham ($6 billion) development in Dubai that’s set to add thousands of homes to the city’s booming market.】

item.title: 丹格特结束尼日利亚作为非洲最大燃料进口国的历史
item.description: 随着丹格特（Dangote）大型炼油厂提高产量，尼日利亚作为非洲最大燃料进口国的时代已经结束。据一家咨询公司称，这一称号现在由南非保持，因为南非的燃料生产运营能力已经萎缩。【原文：Nigeria’s time as Africa’s biggest fuel importer has ended as the Dangote mega-refinery boosts production. The title is now held by South Africa, where operational fuel-making capacity has shrunk, according to a consultancy.】

item.title: 新世界永续债券随着付息日临近而下跌
item.description: 香港开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：A perpetual bond issued by Hong Kong developer New World Development Co. fell to its lowest level in three months, as investors wait to see whether the company will defer June coupon payments.】

item.title: 拉加德曾讨论提前离开欧洲央行参加世界经济论坛，施瓦布告诉《金融时报》记者
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）在接受英国《金融时报》采访时表示，世界经济论坛已离任的创始人克劳斯-施瓦布（Klaus Schwab）曾讨论过缩短其担任该论坛主席的任期。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde has discussed cutting short her term to chair the World Economic Forum, the organization’s departed founder Klaus Schwab told the Financial Times in an interview.】

item.title: 据说申银万国考虑在香港而非伦敦上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，申银万国集团有限公司正在考虑将其首次公开募股计划从伦敦转到香港。【原文：Shein Group Ltd. is considering switching its planned initial public offering to Hong Kong instead of London, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 墨西哥司法改革现在掌握在迷茫的选民手中
item.description: 在墨西哥，这是一场与众不同的选举。没有挤满党派信徒的体育场。电视或华丽的海报上几乎看不到通常无处不在的候选人的笑脸。但其利害关系却再高不过。【原文：It’s an election unlike any other in Mexico. No sports stadiums packed with the party faithful. The smiling faces of normally omnipresent candidates almost completely absent on TV or glitzy posters. But the stakes couldn’t be higher.】

item.title: 加息后日本央行债券持有量损失创纪录
item.description: 在截至 3 月的一年中，日本央行因持有政府债券而积累了有记录以来最大的未实现损失，这凸显了日本央行在解除十多年来超常规货币宽松政策方面所面临的挑战。【原文：The Bank of Japan amassed the largest amount of unrealized losses on record from its government bond holdings in the year ended March, highlighting the challenges it faces in unwinding more than a decade of extraordinary monetary easing.】

item.title: 在人工智能发展不平衡的情况下，荷兰保险公司弃用老式聊天机器人
item.description: NN Group NV 正在用一种能与人类进行更自然互动的聊天机器人取代面向客户的预编程聊天机器人，这进一步证明了人工智能在金融服务领域的推广虽然持续但并不均衡。【原文：NN Group NV is replacing pre-programmed chat bots in client-facing roles with a version that can interact more naturally with humans, further evidence of the continued but uneven roll-out of artificial intelligence in financial services.】

item.title: 特朗普支持新日铁出价提升日本贸易谈判希望
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统支持新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：President Donald Trump’s pivot to champion Nippon Steel Corp.’s bid to buy US Steel Corp. raises the prospect of fresh positive momentum for Japan’s sluggish negotiations with the US over tariff relief.】

item.title: 投票在即，韩国总统李明博在民意调查中的领先优势不断扩大
item.description: 根据最新的民意调查，韩国总统候选人李在明的领先优势超过了执政党提名人金文秀，这再次表明，如果保守派选票仍然分裂，李在明完全有能力在下周的选举中获胜。【原文：South Korea’s presidential frontrunner Lee Jae-myung increased his lead over ruling party nominee Kim Moon-soo, according to the latest opinion poll, another sign that he is well placed to triumph in next week’s election if the conservative vote remains split.】

item.title: 捷克指责中国对外交部发动网络攻击
item.description: 捷克外交部部长扬-利帕夫斯基（Jan Lipavsky）称，中国黑客是捷克外交部遭受攻击的幕后黑手。【原文：Chinese hackers were behind an attack against the Czech Republic’s foreign ministry, according to the ministry’s head Jan Lipavsky.】

item.title: 日本的 "中等国家 "银行令中国游客费解
item.description: 中国银行（Chugoku Bank）是日本一家小型贷款机构，以其所在的日本中部地区命名。但是，它却不得不将中国的潜在客户拒之门外，让他们相信自己遇到了全球巨头中国银行的分行。【原文：Chugoku Bank is a small Japanese lender named after the central Japanese region where it’s based. But it’s having to turn away Chinese would-be customers convinced they have come across a branch of the global giant Bank of China.】

item.title: 关税担忧未消，台湾下调 2025 年经济增长预测
item.description: 台湾下调了今年的经济增长预期，反映了对美国潜在关税对台湾出口导向型经济影响的担忧。【原文：Taiwan lowered its economic growth outlook for this year, reflecting concern about the impact of potential US tariffs on the archipelago’s export-driven economy.】
